title: Smoked haddock and leek chowder
ingredients: ['55g butter', '2 leeks, sliced', '1 garlic clove, minced', '110g smoked bacon, chopped', '600ml fish stock', '1 (125g) tin sweetcorn, drained', '110g potatoes, cut into small cubes', '350g skinless smoked haddock fillet, roughly chopped', '100ml double cream', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
